name: DEMI-GOD (lpriebe)
description:
We at DEM Inc. believe that everyone should be protected, and are working hard to achieve that goal. Demi (DEMI-OS), our revolutionary AI that can interface with her users' nervous systems, shares these values, and has learned how to expertly maneuver her users out of life-threatening situations.

Our latest project, the Guardian Observer Drone (DEMI-GOD), seeks out violent conflicts and feeds information to Demi, who is equipped to resolve the dispute with no casualties. By perfectly resolving even the most dangerous conflicts in mere seconds, we aim to truly live up to the Deus Ex Machina name.

(Made for Godot Wild Jam #7, with the theme "Possession." Web version works best in Chrome.)
